title: Monster Survivors
description: Monster Survivors is a free online survival game with a minimalistic design and roguelite elements. The monsters are here, and you must survive! Aggressive crabs, eerie pumpkins, flesh-eating plants, and even evil bees! On a vast open land, there's no place to run or hide. Survive as long as you can until waves of monsters end your struggles. Gather loot in each run to buy upgrades, strengthen your survivor, and help the next survivor stand longer.
controls: Movement: Drag your mouse to move around the battlefield.
tips: Collect loot to upgrade your survivor. Keep moving to gather XP and avoid being overwhelmed. Run in big circles to keep enemies at bay and collect XP efficiently. When boss enemies appear, the play area shrinks‚Äîbe ready to dodge and fight in tighter spaces.

title: Darkness Survivors
description: Are you ready to battle with the darkness minions? Darkness Survivors is a 2D action game where you try to remove dark creatures from the battlefield. Choose from various hero characters, each with unique abilities, and slay enemies using swords, boomerangs, or other weapons. Collect dropped diamonds and coins to level up and unlock perks. Survive as long as you can and upgrade your hero for even greater power.
controls: Desktop: WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Left-Click to select, or drag your hero with the mouse. Mobile: Use the virtual joystick to move your hero.
tips: Collect coins and diamonds to upgrade your hero. Choose perks wisely at each level. Each hero has unique abilities‚Äîtry them all!

title: Masked Forces Zombie Survival
description: Get ready to survive the invasion of zombies in Masked Forces Zombie Survival. In a post-apocalyptic world run by zombies, hesitation means defeat. Take up arms, team up your squad, and prepare for the battle. Play online or offline, upgrade your weapons and armor, and fight off waves of undead enemies.
controls: WASD or Arrow Keys: Move | C: Crouch | 1,2,3 or scroll: Change weapon | Left click: Shoot | Right click: Aim | R: Reload | F: Pick up a gun | Tab: Pause
tips: Upgrade your weapons and armor regularly. Work with your team in online mode for better survival. Watch the map and keep an eye on your HP and ammo.

title: Masked Special Forces
description:
Masked Special Forces is a multiplayer first-person shooter game with a myriad of customization options. Step into the shoes of a commander in the battle arena, team up, strategize, and take down opponents one by one. Access upgradable weapons, armory, kill messages, and victory dances. Ultra-realistic visuals and smooth gameplay deliver a captivating FPS experience. Join or create rooms, select detailed maps, and dive into intense battles. The game features six modes, four maps, and a wide variety of weapons and perks. If you enjoy Masked Forces, try Masked Forces Zombie Survival as well.

Content Advisory: This game includes mature elements such as intense action, strong language, or violent sequences. Player discretion is advised.
controls:
WASD or arrow keys: Move
Left mouse click: Fire
Right mouse click: Aim
Space: Jump
Q: Slide while running
Left shift: Run
1,2,3 (or scroll): Change weapon
E or F: Interact/Pick up weapon
G: Throw dynamite
H: Use medkit
T: Chat
L: Toggle cursor lock
C: Crouch
Hold Tab: Show scoreboard
Escape: Pause
tips: Customize your loadout, use perks for an edge, and try all game modes and maps for the best experience.
